author: phyloong
body:
# Steps to reproduce

1. Right-click on desktop
2. Select `PowerShell 6`->`Open here as Administrator`
3. Type `pip install flask` in the opened window (actually, every command)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29867903/57174538-1f7b9d00-6e73-11e9-8965-33001be741c1.png)

# Expected behavior

It can execute commands normally.

# Actual behavior

The result of command is right. But during execution, the font changes from `Consolas` from `新宋体` and changes back after the execution end.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29867903/57174635-6fa72f00-6e74-11e9-881a-27a45f55aeb1.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29867903/57174640-88174980-6e74-11e9-9d53-37bc37a93d4d.png)


# Environment data

comments.body: @pboymt 6.2.1 still ships with PSReadLine 2.0.0-beta3.  Can you install beta4 from PSGallery and see if it is still an issue?
